title: 78/246. Report on the activities of the Ethics Office
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/78/246
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
28 December 2023 
 
23-26260 (E)    030124 
*2326260* 
 
 
Seventy-eighth session 
Agenda item 140 
Report on the activities of the Ethics Office 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly on 
22 December 2023 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Fifth Committee (A/78/646, para. 6)] 
 
 
 78/246. Report on the activities of the Ethics Office 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling its resolutions 60/254 of 8 May 2006, 62/247 of 3 April 2008, 63/250 
of 24 December 2008, 66/234 of 24 December 2011, 67/255 of 12 April 2013, 68/252 
of 27 December 2013, 71/263 of 23 December 2016 and 77/278 of 18 April 2023,  
 
Having considered the report of the Ethics Office,1  
 
Takes note of the report of the Ethics Office. 
 
50th (resumed) plenary meeting 
22 December 2023 
 
__________________ 
 
1 A/78/91.
